column5: I'm trying to post a pic and when I try I get an error sayin I can't upload this kind of file. It's a bitmap image, not that I know what that means. I could use some help. Thanks
The photo section might have the info that you need.  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showforum=35   Many of us use photobucket to host/post our photos.
